git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/SMSPopup@74 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6

Huge update, preparing for all the new features!
-customize notifications per user
-'quick message' (store pre-set messages to auto-respond to messages)
-quick reply support (reply directly from popup)
-added service to help clear notifications properly and track sent messages (not yet complete)
-still very buggy with all new things added
-strings and help not yet updated (all localizations will need updates)
-split up layouts into 'includes' and 'stubs' for better performance and maintenance

git-svn-id: https://android-smspopup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/SMSPopup@75 dacd1dde-df38-11dd-9759-139c9ab14fc6
